item.title: Sketchbook Stuff
item.author: itsbledley@posteo.com (Bledley)
item.description: Ballpoint pen sketches of Joe Strummer and Paul Simonon from The Clash and a pencil drawing of a random model from Pinterest. From my sketchbook. Related Posts 2023-07-16 Sketchbook Stuff 2021-11-19 Sketchbook Stuff
